data.text:
SEEING SIGNS OF BLACK MOULD AT HOME AFTER FLOOD OR WATER DAMAGE?

You experienced a flood, or water damage in your home, you mopped it up and called it a day. But there is likely water in places you cannot access. Damage to flooring and walls can be evident, manifested as warping, or blistering of paint or wallpaper. Alternatively, they may seem dry on the surface, but are actually damp beneath.

Moisture, in walls, ventilation systems, carpets, furnishings and more, for any length of time, leads to mould growth. Your belongings will start to emit a foul odour, and those living in the house could fall ill.

The importance of taking quick action after flooding in your home cannot be overstated. Nor can you overstate the critical importance of employing a water damage and mould removal company. ServiceMaster Restore of Regina provides expert structural drying and dehumidification services. We use industrial-grade dehumidifiers and high-velocity air movers to remove moisture from the air quickly and efficiently.

WE MAKE SURE TO GET YOUR HOME DRY, QUICKLY.

If moisture continues and the water damaged area of your home do not dry adequately, walls or other surfaces will start showing black mold. Typically, mould will start growing and proliferating within the initial 24 to 48 hours. Black mould is a toxic contaminant that can cause serious health risks. This mould can also cause costly structural damage to your home if not professionally eliminated by mould removal specialists.

Black mould gradually destroys whatever surfaces it grows on…and it can grow anywhere in the home. Mould spreads and reproduces by spores, which air or water can carry to new locations and cause new growth. It can seriously impact indoor air quality, causing a host of health issues including headaches, breathing difficulties, and allergic reactions. This may all seem overwhelming.

ServiceMaster Restore of Regina, is the mould removal and restoration company of choice for Regina, Yorkton, Estevan. One phone call brings skilled experts who quickly and effectively resolve the situation. We will eliminate the mould and the odour. We’ll work directly and collaboratively with you to provide outstanding results.

24-HOUR EMERGENCY RESTORATION SERVICES

Trust ServiceMaster Restore of Regina for expert mould remediation services. Contact us following any incidence of water damage or flooding before black mould has a chance to grow. Nonetheless, should you notice any mould or detect a damp smell in your house, we are ready to assist.

Avoid jeopardizing your health by attempting to eliminate black mould from your home on your own. We have the resources to respond immediately. And our technicians have the expertise and specialty equipment required to professionally remove the mould. We will remove the mould from your home and to help prevent mould growth from reoccurring.

The experts at ServiceMaster Restore of Regina work to get the job done right. And we will stay by your side until you are satisfied with the results.
